title: Tusedays with Morrie
author: Mitch Albom
description: A must read for everyone who seeking happiness and the meaning of life in their life!

title: Ego is the Enemy
author: Ryan Holiday
description: This book explores the negative aspects of the ego and it’s effects on several historical and contemporary figures.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert Kiyosaki
description: Personal finance book of all time

title: Zero To One
author: Peter Thiel
description: This book is an absolute classic on Entrepreneurship

title: The Teachings Of Krishna
author: Osho
description: Like his other works, this book also giving a broad perception about human life. Krishna is the most apt example to describe the life in depth.

title: Can't Hurt Me
author: David Goggins
description: The only man in history to complete elite training as a Navy SEAL, Army Ranger, and Air Force Tactical Air Controller.

title: The Secret
author: Rhonda Byrne
description: Everything that’s coming into your life you’re attracting into your life. And it’s attracted to you by virtue of the images you’re holding in your mind. it’s what you’re thinking. whatever is going on your mind you’re attracting to you.

title: Why I assasinated Mahatma Gandhi ?
author: Nathuram Godse
description: This book contains the entire statement which godse gave to the court which was earlier banned...it also contains brief views of nathuram Godse's brother and of the editor!
